name: The Other Side Of The Sun
lyric:
作词：janis lan&albert hammond　作曲：janis lan&albert hammond


leaving on a boat for beyond the other side of the ocean
bet you in the morning you won't even know i'm gone
tired of living here in middle of mixed emotion
might as well be living on the other side of the sun

leaving with a feeling i don't know
though once i knew the special way
and what to do to make you stay
even as i'm leaving i'll never stop
you are the one who can make me laugh
and can bring me back from beyond the

sailing down the river i hope i can deliver the morning
wishing on a star for the sun to come out and play
ain't it funny when it's over you really don't remember
might as well be living out beyond the milky way forever &

+

comments.brief: 热到甩动的冬日午后，就着阳光一个人听着那几年听过的林一峰。睡了场午觉，回到约莫三十年前小清新的梦里。矫情便秘般的剧情扭捏起伏。事后我汗湿夹背的惊醒过来，并悟出了惊天咪咪，小清新，是没有好结果的，于是我伤感的留下了盐水。我当年竟大庭广众下唱过这首歌。
